column1: Smoque BBQ////I had the half brisket sandwich
column2: a quarter slab of the St. Louis ribs
column3: and baked beans. I love that they give you two kinds of BBQ sauce. The brisket had delicious bark on it though the meat was a tad dry. The ribs were simply heavenly. My friend ordered several sides and they were all yummy; the peach cobbler was great. I would definitely come back if I visit Chicago again.
